title: COVID-19 Vaccine Injured Doctors are Finally Starting to Speak Up, page 1
cleaned_text:
COVID-19 vaccine injured doctors are finally starting to speak up…and they are shocked that the medical establishment abandons them.

Commenting is limited to medical professionals. To comment please Log-in.

Good Feedback from doctor's themselves for anyone interested that can admit that there are problems. I know we have a few here who probably work in big Pharma "cough" that do not want to hear this and will most probably be along soon to call them liars.Bottom line, There Are Problems and there is an organized effort from the top to cover this fact up, sweep it under the rug, use confusion and disinformation to cover for these Pharm companies and it needs to stop. We seriously need to admit the problem and research the causes and possible treatments / cures to what has been done.Thousands of Doctors report their side effects on this comment chain at Medscape and have been for months:
